text: Fatih Porikli is an engineer at Mitsubishi Electric Research Laboratories in Cambridge, Massachusetts. He was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2014 for his contributions to computer vision and video surveillance. Porikli is currently working as a Chief Scientist at Global Technologies Lab at Huawei, and as a Professor at Australian National University. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Mitsubishi Electric people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Fatih Porikli
